Name: Casablanca
Overview: Film A truly perfect movie, the 1942 Casablanca still wows viewers today, and for good reason.
Description:
A truly perfect movie, the 1942 Casablanca still wows viewers today, and for good reason. Its unique story of a love triangle set against terribly high stakes in the war against a monster is sophisticated instead of outlandish, intriguing instead of garish. Humphrey Bogart plays the allegedly apolitical club owner in unoccupied French territory that is nevertheless crawling with Nazis; Ingrid Bergman is the lover who mysteriously deserted him in Paris; and Paul Heinreid is her heroic, slightly bewildered husband. Claude Rains, Sydney Greenstreet, Peter Lorre, and Conrad Veidt are among what may be the best supporting cast in the history of Hollywood films. This is certainly among the most spirited and ennobling movies ever made.

-Tom Keogh

Name: Some Like it Hot
Overview: Film When Chicago musicians Joe (Tony Curtis) and Jerry (Jack Lemmon) accidentally witness a gangland shooting, they quickly board a southbound train to Florida, disguised as Josephine and Daphne, the two newest and homeliest members of an all-girl jazz band.
Description:
When Chicago musicians Joe (Tony Curtis) and Jerry (Jack Lemmon) accidentally witness a gangland shooting, they quickly board a southbound train to Florida, disguised as Josephine and Daphne, the two newest and homeliest members of an all-girl jazz band. Their cover is perfect...until a lovelorn singer (Marilyn Monroe) falls for Josephine, an ancient playboy (Joe E. Brown) falls for Daphne, and a mob boss (George Raft) refuses to fall for their hoax! Nominated for 6 Academy Awards, Some Like It Hot is the quintessential madcap farce and one of the greatest of all film comedies.

-The Motion Picture Guide

Name: Night of the Iguana
Overview: Film The Night of the Iguana may be Richard Burton's finest hour on the screen: beautifully cast as an anguished, defrocked reverend, doomed to his own purgatory in Mexico as tour guide to a group of nattering biddies.
Description:
The Night of the Iguana may be Richard Burton's finest hour on the screen: beautifully cast as an anguished, defrocked reverend, doomed to his own purgatory in Mexico as tour guide to a group of nattering biddies. (The expression on his face as the ladies warble "Happy Days Are Here Again" on the tour bus is worth a Shakespearian monologue.) John Huston's clean, black-comic adaptation of the Tennessee Williams play is a forceful snapshot of a man down to his last chance, and the superb black-and-white location photography by Gabriel Figueroa captures the end-of-the-world vibe. The women who tempt and taunt the reverend are Ava Gardner (with her maraca-shaking beach boys), Deborah Kerr, and Sue Lyon. The movie--and its backstage publicity, with Burton and Liz Taylor carrying on their Cleopatra affair--put Puerto Vallarta on the map, but it deserves notice for Burton's gutsy acting and Huston's characteristic sympathy for life's losers.

-Robert Horton

Name: Marilyn Monroe: The Final Days
Overview: Film In The Final Days, producer-director Patty Ivins chronicles Marilyn Monroe's final, aborted feature film, Something's Got to Give, which was ultimately shut down after the star was dismissed from the production.
Description:
In The Final Days, producer-director Patty Ivins chronicles Marilyn Monroe's final, aborted feature film, Something's Got to Give, which was ultimately shut down after the star was dismissed from the production. Beyond Monroe's fragile emotional and physical health, this well-crafted profile examines the financial crisis facing her studio as well as the mounting frustration of meticulous director George Cukor and his cast, including costar Dean Martin, as Monroe's absences drove the shoot over budget. The 2001 documentary, which was previously available only as part of The Diamond Collection, concludes with a 40-minute reconstruction of footage completed for the feature, which would subsequently be reshot as a vehicle for Doris Day and James Garner, Move Over, Darling.

-Sam Sutherland

Name: Hotel Costes 2
Overview: Music French only collection, strictly for fans of the Claude Challe 'Buddha Bar' series, red wine, beautiful people etc
Description: French only collection, strictly for fans of the Claude Challe 'Buddha Bar' series, red wine, beautiful people etc al. Highlights include, Pink Martini 'Sympathique', Femi Kuti 'Sorry Sorry', Mr. Scruff 'Get A Move On', 45 Dip/Hed Kandi Artist 'Lizzie's Ballon', Mo' Horizons 'Flying Away' and many, many more.

Name: Hotel Costes 3
Overview: Music Since Pschent started the Costes series any old half-trendy restaurant has started releasing its 'downtempo' compilation.
Description: Since Pschent started the Costes series any old half-trendy restaurant has started releasing its 'downtempo' compilation. The covers all show someone on a sofa, the tracklistings all look the same, and the music is just plain boring. With Costes however we try to make sure that they are always fresh, interesting, the packaging is great (check out the inside of Etage 3). Not just another lounge compilation, we hope you'll agree.

Name: Hotel Costes 4
Overview: Music Celebs like the Rolling Stones, Madonna, and Craig David enjoy hanging out at the legendary, exclusive H�tel Costes in Paris, where the good life is lived with abandon.
Description: Celebs like the Rolling Stones, Madonna, and Craig David enjoy hanging out at the legendary, exclusive H�tel Costes in Paris, where the good life is lived with abandon. This fourth installment of the Costes music series highlights the slick and impressively alternative music selection played at this avant-garde establishment. Mixed by Parisian scenester St�phane Pompougnac, the collection of super-ritzy, downtempo-flavored nuggets starts with the beautiful 'London in the Rain' by Variety Jam and 'I've Got a Cat' by the Method. There's plenty of uptempo vibes too, with Dublex Inc's 'Tango Forte' and slow-burning deep-house missives like Slowsupreme's 'Granada,' Pompougnac's own 'Closer to Julie,' and Jon Cutler's classic 'It's Yours.' After raising temperatures with Imada's Brazilian vibes on 'Playground Do Brazil,' an Afro-Cuban sway on Major Boys' 'Sous le Soleil,' and Doctor Rockit's brand of seduction on 'Caf� de Flore,' Pompougnac brings us back down to floor level toward the end with Gotan Project's 'Epoca,' Shantel's sophisticated shuffle 'Whatever,' and Orbient's supine 'Boarding.' All in all, a great listen and a refreshingly different selection of tracks, many of which are tough to find domestically.

Description:
Feeling self-assured and assertive, the first thing i look for in my closet are my Kelsi Dagger heels, the rest of the outfit will effortlessly fall in place. What wouldn't work with the Kelsi Dagger Brette pumps (1)? I certainly look as bold and prominent as I feel, standing atop a 6 inch high foundation of black suede. And if I'm in the mood to have 7 mile high legs I'll slip into the Lola heels (2) in a skin tone color like "luggage". A Classic Cardigan with a cropped length and elbow sleeves, the Sensual Cardigan can be paired with any look: from bodies to blouses and sleeveless dresses. A pretty V-neckline and tight knit give this cardigan a timeless appeal.

 

- Style# 59628

- Elbow length sleeves

-Deep V neck

- Cropped length at high hip

- Tight 18 density knit

 

- Viscose/Polyester blend

Name: Wolford Jamaika String Body in Clam
Overview: Wolford This quintessential  layering body should be a staple in every woman's wardrobe.
Description:
This quintessential layering body in every woman's wardrobe. Features such as a lightweight high cotton content fabric, elegant but subtle sheen, and a semi sheer neckline and arm trim set thisWolford String Body apart. Whether used as a foundation garment for soft smoothing, as a layering shell for blazers and jackets, or on its own as a sporty tank, the Jaimaika String Body will never show panty lines, come un-tucked, and will ensure a sharp, clean, “put together” statement every single time! An Embrasse-moi MUST HAVE!

 

- Style# 75011

- Medium strap width 1”

- Light colors are semi opaque, medium to dark colors wear 100% opaque

-Fashionable open scoop neckline

- Seamless knitting and string back lay invisible under clothes

- Bottom snap closure

- 48% Cotton, 48% Nylon, 4% Elastane

 

Heights over 5”7” consider sizing up for length.

Name: Wolford Peacock Body
Overview: Wolford Our favorite trend colors this season come together in this stunning and super flattering Peacock Body. Hughes of green myrtle, greystone, and wheat are knit in an intricate peacock feather pattern creating texture and interest. Elbow length sleeves and a wide scoop neckline add the perfect finishing touches. We recommend pairing with the Quilt Pleats Skirt for a spot-on look for any occasion!
Description:
Our favorite trend colors this season come together in this stunning and super flattering Peacock Body. Hughes of green myrtle, greystone, and wheat are knit in an intricate peacock feather pattern creating texture and interest. Elbow length sleeves and a wide scoop neckline add the perfect finishing touches. We recommend pairing with the Quilt Pleats Skirt for a spot-on look for any occasion!

 

- Style# 78202

- Poly/ Nylon/ Cotton blend

- Body featuring full back bottom and snap closure

- Seamless knit technology

- Elbow length sleeves

- Subtle peacock knit design

 

Heights over 5'6” consider sizing up for length

Name: Wolford Bold Stripes String Body
Overview: Wolford Bold Stripes says it all! Rock this season's hottest trend in absolute style. This oh-so-french striped string body features a smooth back without panty lines and will always look fresh and polished whether going for a sporty or elegant look. Seamless knit technology and Wolford's signature quality ensure that this will be a favorite for years to come. An open scoop neckline and short sleeves complete the style.
Description:
Bold Stripes says it all! Rock this season's hottest trend in absolute style. Seamless knit technology and Wolford's signature quality ensure that this will be a favorite for years to come. An open scoop neckline and short sleeves complete the style.

 

- Style# 78210

-Short sleeves

- String body with thong back and snap closure

- Fashionable scoop neckline

Name: Wolford Peacock Net String Body
Overview: Wolford Part tribal glam, part art deco, the Peacock Net String Body is a show stopper. Intricate cut - outs mimic the designs of a feather, creating a sexy skin baring effect. Slip this ultra sexy body under a blazer or wear alone for a true fashion statement.
Description:
Part tribal glam, part art deco, the Peacock Net Sting Body is a show stopper. Intricate cut - outs mimic the designs of a feather, creating a sexy skin baring effect. Slip this ultra sexy body under a blazer or wear alone for a true fashion statement.

 

- Style# 79036

- 80% nylon, 19% elastane 1% cotton

- String body with thong back and snap closure

- Seamless knit technology

- Sleeveless

- Skin baring cut-outs mimic the design of a feather
